ComicInfo.Title: Infamous
ComicInfo.Summary:
The combined forces of the Colonial Warriors and the Cylon Raiders fend off Count Iblisâ€™ fiendish armada. But Iblis is determined to have his vengeance against the enigmatic Seraphs, even if he has to sacrifice every living soul on the fleet to do it! As the battle reaches its epic conclusion, the Galactica embarks in a surprising new direction!
